task.title: Publish a Livefyre Component to a Page
task.shortdesc: Follow these steps to publish a Livefyre Component to a page in AEM.

step.cmd: Enable the Livefyre Cloud Service for a Page
Add a Livefyre Component to a page.
Edit the App in Livefyre Studio to stream social content into the App.
Publish the AEM page to make the App available to your AEM site or community. For more information on how to publish pages using AEM, see Publishing Pages on docs.adobe.com.
